trans-unit.source: Displays user interface dialogs that allow you to select and view X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: 顯示使用者介面對話方塊可讓您選取和檢視的 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Use the methods of the X509Certificate2UI class to present user interface dialogs that display detailed information about an X.509 certificate or allow users to select one or more certificates from a collection of X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 X509Certificate2UI 類別的方法呈現使用者介面對話方塊顯示 X.509 憑證的詳細的資訊，或允許使用者從 X.509 憑證的集合，選取一個或多個憑證。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box that contains the properties of an X.509 certificate and its associated certificate chain.
trans-unit.target: 顯示對話方塊，其中包含 X.509 憑證和其相關聯的憑證鏈結的內容。

trans-unit.source: The DisplayCertificate method displays a dialog box with detailed information about the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: DisplayCertificate 方法會顯示對話方塊中指定的 X.509 憑證的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: The dialog box includes buttons for installing or copying the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 此對話方塊包含用於安裝或複製憑證的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to display.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: The certificate parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The certificate parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The certificate parameter is invalid.
trans-unit.target: certificate 參數無效。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box that contains the properties of an X.509 certificate and its associated certificate chain using a handle to a parent window.
trans-unit.target: 顯示對話方塊，其中包含 X.509 憑證和其相關聯的憑證鏈結，使用父視窗控制代碼的內容。

trans-unit.source: The DisplayCertificate method displays a dialog box with detailed information about the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: DisplayCertificate 方法會顯示對話方塊中指定的 X.509 憑證的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to nest dialog boxes that display certificate information.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以用來建立巢狀的對話方塊，顯示憑證資訊。

trans-unit.source: The dialog box includes buttons for installing or copying the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 此對話方塊包含用於安裝或複製憑證的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to display.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: A handle to the parent window to use for the display dialog.
trans-unit.target: 要用於顯示對話方塊的父視窗控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The certificate parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The certificate parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The certificate parameter is invalid.
trans-unit.target: certificate 參數無效。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box for selecting an X.509 certificate from a certificate collection.
trans-unit.target: 會顯示一個對話方塊來選取憑證集合中的 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectFromCollection method if you require users to manually select X.509 certificates using a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要以手動方式選取 使用對話方塊中的 X.509 憑證的使用者，請使用 SelectFromCollection 方法。

trans-unit.source: If no user interaction is required, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果不不需要任何使用者互動，使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A collection of X.509 certificates to select from.
trans-unit.target: 若要從選取的 X.509 憑證的集合。

trans-unit.source: The title of the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 對話方塊的標題。

trans-unit.source: A descriptive message to guide the user.
trans-unit.target: 若要引導使用者的描述性訊息。

trans-unit.source: The message is displayed in the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 在對話方塊中，會顯示訊息。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SelectionFlag"></xref> values that specifies whether single or multiple selections are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SelectionFlag"></xref>值，指定是否允許單一或多個選取項目。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object that contains the selected certificate or certificates.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref>物件，其中包含所選取的憑證。

trans-unit.source: The selectionFlag parameter is not a valid flag.
trans-unit.target: selectionFlag 參數不是有效的旗標。

trans-unit.source: The certificates parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The certificates parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The certificates parameter is invalid.
trans-unit.target: certificates 參數無效。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box for selecting an X.509 certificate from a certificate collection using a handle to a parent window.
trans-unit.target: 顯示對話方塊，從使用父視窗控制代碼的憑證集合中選取 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectFromCollection method if you require users to manually select X.509 certificates using a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要以手動方式選取 使用對話方塊中的 X.509 憑證的使用者，請使用 SelectFromCollection 方法。

trans-unit.source: If no user interaction is required, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果不不需要任何使用者互動，使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A collection of X.509 certificates to select from.
trans-unit.target: 若要從選取的 X.509 憑證的集合。

trans-unit.source: The title of the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 對話方塊的標題。

trans-unit.source: A descriptive message to guide the user.
trans-unit.target: 若要引導使用者的描述性訊息。

trans-unit.source: The message is displayed in the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 在對話方塊中，會顯示訊息。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SelectionFlag"></xref> values that specifies whether single or multiple selections are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SelectionFlag"></xref>值，指定是否允許單一或多個選取項目。

trans-unit.source: A handle to the parent window to use for the display dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 要用於顯示對話方塊的父視窗控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object that contains the selected certificate or certificates.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref>物件，其中包含所選取的憑證。

trans-unit.source: The selectionFlag parameter is not a valid flag.
trans-unit.target: selectionFlag 參數不是有效的旗標。

trans-unit.source: The certificates parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The certificates parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The certificates parameter is invalid.
trans-unit.target: certificates 參數無效。
